Package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.format.yaml

Class YamlFormat

java.lang.Object
com.github.siroshun09.configapi.format.yaml.YamlFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileFormat<MapNode>
public final class YamlFormat extends Object implements FileFormat<MapNode>
A FileFormat implementation that loading/saving MapNode from/to yaml files.

Supported Nodes:

  • ValueNodes
    • CharValue and CharArray is written as String
    • EnumValue will be written as String using Enum.name()
    • Loading CharValue, CharArray, and EnumValue is not supported
  • MapNode and ListNode
  • ArrayNodes: serialize only
  • NullNode
  • ObjectNode that holds a basic Java object
    • The list of supported Java objects is in SafeRepresenter (snakeyaml)
    • Other object types are not supported
